Warmth.help: You can use your Warmth to heal some of your wounds, and the wounds of your group. This power has a small radius, so your allies need to be near you if they wish to be affected. Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Fire_Shield.help: Casts a Thermal Shield on one of your allies and grants them damage resistance to Lethal, Smashing and Fire damage. Thermal Shield also provides minimal resistance to Cold damage. You cannot stack multiple Thermal Shields on the same target, however the shield can be improved by another ally using the same power. Can also be used in conjunction with your Plasma Shield. You cannot use this power on yourself. Recharge: Very Fast
Fire_Shield.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Smashing, Lethal, Fire and Cold Damage with your {PowerName}.
Fire_Shield.victimHit: You are now more resistant to Smashing, Lethal, Fire, and Cold damage, due to the {PowerName} from {PlayerSource}.

Cauterize.help: Heals a single targeted ally by cauterizing their wounds. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Thaw.help: Warms an ally and frees them from any Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, Slow and Immobilize effects and leaves them resistant to such effects for a good while. Thaw also grants the target some resistance to Cold damage. Some of the effects of this power will improve with multiple applications and as you advance in level. Recharge: Fast
Thaw.shortHelp: Ally +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.targetHelp: You have been Thawed. You now have temporary resistance to Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear and slow effects and your resistance to Cold is improved.
Thaw.targetShortHelp: +Res(Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Immobilize, Confuse, Fear, Cold, Slow)
Thaw.attackerHit: You protect {PlayerDest} from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects with your {PowerName} power.
Thaw.victimHit: {PlayerSource} protects you from Cold, Slow, Disorient, Hold, Sleep, Confuse, Fear, and Immobilize effects.

Forge.help: Forge a single ally target into a killing machine. Forge immensely enhances a single ally's Damage and chance to hit. Recharge: Long
Forge.targetHelp: You have been Forged into a killing machine. Your Damage and chance to hit have all been increased.
Forge.attackerHit: You greatly increase the Damage and chance to hit of {PlayerDest}.
Forge.victimHit: {PlayerSource} greatly increases your Damage and chance to hit.

Heat_Exhaustion.help: Overwhelm a single foe with waves of exhausting heat. The initial effect will drain the target of some Endurance, but the heat is so overwhelming that the affected target will be weakened. Their Damage output, Endurance Recovery and Hit Point Regeneration will all be reduced. Recharge: Long
Heat_Exhaustion.targetHelp: Your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration have been reduced.
Heat_Exhaustion.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration of {PlayerDest}.
Heat_Exhaustion.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Damage output, Endurance Recovery and HP Regeneration.

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} shocks you with their {PowerName} and drains some of your Endurance!

Melt_Armor.help: The searing Heat from this power is enough to Melt the Armor and defenses of all targets in the affected area. Melt Armor significantly weakens the Defense and Damage Resistance of the affected targets. Recharge: Long
Melt_Armor.targetHelp: Your Defense and Damage Resistances have been reduced.
Melt_Armor.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} reduced the Defense and Damage Resistance of {PlayerDest}.
Melt_Armor.victimHit: {PlayerSource} reduces your Defense and Damage Resistance.
